dethroned_heroine_ashe.name: Dethroned Heroine Ashe
dethroned_heroine_ashe.notes:
Magic fire/wind/lightning chainer with minor support capabilities
Can apply provoke to one ally.Can negate spells.Can massively buff her own magic mitigation, although this burns through her MP extremely quickly.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

vossler.name: Vossler
vossler.notes:
Magic cover and provoke tank with support capabilities
Can provide 50% AoE general mitigation, 30% AoE magic mitigation, 180% AoE stat buffs, resistance buffs to four elements at varying magnitudes, and 65% breaks.Can dualcast his cover and his provoke.

knight_of_pluto_zidane.name: Knight of Pluto Zidane
knight_of_pluto_zidane.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical wind chainer
Can provide AoE mirage.Can alternately be used as a dodge provoke tank that also provides mirage every turn.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

garland_(ffix).name: Garland (FFIX)
garland_(ffix).notes:
Fire/dark magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

angel_of_death_kuja.name: Angel of Death Kuja
angel_of_death_kuja.notes:
Fire/light magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

fina_&_dark_fina.name: Fina & Dark Fina
fina_&_dark_fina.notes:
Healer
 Alternately, she can be used as an Earth magic chainer.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

zenaida.name: Zenaida
zenaida.notes:
Fire/earth/lightning/dark chainer and finisher
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

blue_sky_belle_fran.name: Blue Sky Belle Fran
blue_sky_belle_fran.notes:
Fire/ice/earth physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity and Bolting Strike families.

dancing_heart_penelo.name: Dancing Heart Penelo
dancing_heart_penelo.notes:
Fire/ice/dark magic chainer
Has 70% breaks, a 150% SPR buff, and 30% magic mitigation, but using any of these will eat heavily into her damage output.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

seeker_of_freedom_vaan.name: Seeker of Freedom Vaan
seeker_of_freedom_vaan.notes:
Breaker with support and dodge provoke tanking capabilities
Has breaks of up to 85%.Can provide AoE mirage, and with his innate triplecast, active provoke, and high evasion, it's easy to make him into an evasion-based provoke tank who also handles breaking.

healing_avatar_lid.name: Healing Avatar Lid
healing_avatar_lid.notes:
Breaker with some support capabilities
Can provide up to 85% breaks, partial uptime on ailment/break/stop/charm immunity, and dispel buffs from enemies while leaving debuffs intact.

umbral_dragon_dark_fina.name: Umbral Dragon Dark Fina
umbral_dragon_dark_fina.notes:
Magic dark chainer
Can also use wind or earth at a moderate damage loss.Burns through her MP extremely quickly.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

steadfast_soldier_machina.name: Steadfast Soldier Machina
steadfast_soldier_machina.notes:
Primarily single-target breaker that also provides some buffs
Provides breaks of up to 80%, although he can realistically only maintain 75%.Can AoE buff DEF/SPR by 150% and physical/magical mitigation by 30%.Can commit suicide to fill the esper gauge and provide massive AoE LB fill.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

benevolent_beauty_rem.name: Benevolent Beauty Rem
benevolent_beauty_rem.notes:
Fire/ice/lightning magic chainer
Her abilities are physical attacks with magic damage, which means that she uses physical killers and can take advantage of external imbues.Can provide 50% general mitigation and AoE reraise, but not with full uptime.Can commit suicide to fill the esper gauge and provide massive AoE LB fill.Passively provides some esper gauge generation each turn.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

wild_card_ace.name: Wild Card Ace
wild_card_ace.notes:
Ice/lightning magic chainer
His abilities are physical attacks with magic damage, which means that he uses physical killers and can take advantage of external imbues.Can provide AoE mirage and, after several turns of setup, brief AoE reraise.Can commit suicide to fill the esper gauge and provide massive AoE LB fill.Passively provides some AoE MP recovery and esper gauge generation each turn.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened and Bolting Strike families.

sterne_leonis.name: Sterne Leonis
sterne_leonis.notes:
Time limited unitIce/dark physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

kitone.name: Kitone
kitone.notes:
Time limited unitFire/earth physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity and Stardust Ray families.

mont_leonis.name: Mont Leonis
mont_leonis.notes: Time limited unitPhysical cover tank that can dualcast provoke and cover

blue_mage_fina.name: Blue Mage Fina
blue_mage_fina.notes: Healer that can also provide stat and elemental resistance buffs

selphie.name: Selphie
selphie.notes:
Magic water/earth chainer
Has some moves that are physical attacks with magic damage, avoiding one of the common mage drawbacks.Has some utility, although much of it is stuck behind random unlocks.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

quistis.name: Quistis
quistis.notes: Time limited unitHealer that can also provide 40% general mitigation and minor LB fill to the party

seifer.name: Seifer
seifer.notes:
Physical dark/earth chainer
Can also serve as an evasion provoke tank, although this will significantly reduce his damage output.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

rico_rodriguez.name: Rico Rodriguez
rico_rodriguez.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical fire chainer
Due to the nature of his magnus ability, he will mostly only chain with a dupe.

serah.name: Serah
serah.notes:
Magic wind/earth/light chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

lightning_(ffxiii-2).name: Lightning (FFXIII-2)
lightning_(ffxiii-2).notes:
Time limited unitMagic cover and provoke tank
Can dualcast her cover and provoke.Is unusually hard to kill, especially on turn 1.Can provide 50% AoE general mitigation.

noel.name: Noel
noel.notes:
Physical water chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

daughter_of_destiny_vanille.name: Daughter of Destiny Vanille
daughter_of_destiny_vanille.notes:
Breaker with some extra utility
Can provide 80% full breaks, AoE imbue/imperil earth, and buff several elemental resistances.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

untamed_wolf_edel.name: Untamed Wolf Edel
untamed_wolf_edel.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical fire/wind chainer
Her mitigation counters mean that in some circumstances, she can be incredibly tanky, although with a 1-turn duration and only a 60% counter chance, it's too unreliable for most fights.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

four_winds_physalis.name: Four Winds Physalis
four_winds_physalis.notes:
Magic wind/water chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

war_hero_raegen.name: War Hero Raegen
war_hero_raegen.notes:
Physical fire/ice chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

hallowed_aegis_charlotte.name: Hallowed Aegis Charlotte
hallowed_aegis_charlotte.notes:
Physical cover tank with freakishly high durability
Can provide 50% AoE general mitigation, 25% magic/physical mitigation, stat buffs, and 2k AoE barriers.

mystical_ice_lasswell.name: Mystical Ice Lasswell
mystical_ice_lasswell.notes:
Physical ice chainer (with wind as a weaker backup option)
Has some minor utility, such as an LB-consuming move that provides one turn of AoE reraise.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

cloud_(ffvii:_ac).name: Cloud (FFVII: AC)
cloud_(ffvii:_ac).notes:
Physical light/earth chainer
Can also be used as a finisher.

tifa_(ffvii:_ac).name: Tifa (FFVII: AC)
tifa_(ffvii:_ac).notes:
Physical water/lightning chainer
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

kadaj.name: Kadaj
kadaj.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical wind/dark chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

lezard_valeth.name: Lezard Valeth
lezard_valeth.notes:
Time limited unitMagic fire/lightning/dark chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

mystina.name: Mystina
mystina.notes:
Time limited unitMagic fire/dark/wind chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

y'shtola,_the_sorceress.name: Y'shtola, the Sorceress
y'shtola,_the_sorceress.notes:
Time limited unitMagic lightning/wind chainer
Requires an external imperil.Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

supreme_deva_akstar.name: Supreme Deva Akstar
supreme_deva_akstar.notes:
Physical fire/ice/dark chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

dark_spirit_sol.name: Dark Spirit Sol
dark_spirit_sol.notes:
Magic fire/dark chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

draconian_princess_fina.name: Draconian Princess Fina
draconian_princess_fina.notes:
Magic light/dark chainer
Has some minor support capabilities, including elemental resistances, Curaja, and esper gauge fill.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

infernal_fire_rain.name: Infernal Fire Rain
infernal_fire_rain.notes:
Physical fire/earth chainer
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

nichol_of_the_epsilon_star.name: Nichol of the Epsilon Star
nichol_of_the_epsilon_star.notes: Buffer with 50% general mitigation, 30% typed mitigation, barriers, significant AoE LB fill, and more

sakura_of_the_delta_star.name: Sakura of the Delta Star
sakura_of_the_delta_star.notes:
Magic lightning finisher
Suffers from severe gearing issues due to being a TDH LB mage.

gilgamesh_(wotv_ffbe).name: Gilgamesh (WOTV FFBE)
gilgamesh_(wotv_ffbe).notes:
Physical ice chainer
He can also be used as a magic chainer, but his damage is drastically lower if used in this way.Has a cooldown that can completely fill a single ally's LB gauge.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

dragon_knight_freya.name: Dragon Knight Freya
dragon_knight_freya.notes:
Physical jump-based finisher
Requires an external imperil.

black_mage_vivi.name: Black Mage Vivi
black_mage_vivi.notes:
Magic dark finisher or fire/ice/lightning chainer
Can buff magic mitigation by 30%.His magic finishing move also hits the party, so dark immunity for your own team is necessary if you're planning to use it on a turn that does not immediately follow his cooldown.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

rakish_thief_zidane.name: Rakish Thief Zidane
rakish_thief_zidane.notes:
Physical wind chainer
Can provide AoE mirage.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

strange_gourmand_quina.name: Strange Gourmand Quina
strange_gourmand_quina.notes:
Time limited unitUnit that can serve as either a healer with some support capabilities, or as a dedicated barrier-spamming support
Has an on-demand 3k AoE barrier with attached 150% DEF/SPR and 20% physical/magical mitigation buffs.Has a cooldown that provides a 5k AoE barrier.

roy_mustang.name: Roy Mustang
roy_mustang.notes:
Time limited unitMagic fire finisher
Suffers from severe gearing issues due to being a TDH LB mage.

king_bradley.name: King Bradley
king_bradley.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical lightning chainer
Can provide backup breaks for the team.Can easily be geared to reach 100% evasion at a minimal damage loss.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

alphonse_elric.name: Alphonse Elric
alphonse_elric.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical cover and provoke tank
Can buff the party's mitigation by 50% and their DEF/SPR by 200%.Provides significant AoE barriers.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

edward_elric.name: Edward Elric
edward_elric.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical fire/water/wind/earth chainer
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

yuna_(ffx-2).name: Yuna (FFX-2)
yuna_(ffx-2).notes:
Physical fire/ice/lightning/water chainer, but requires an external imperil
Can provide 30% AoE mitigation.Can provide AoE reraise via her LB.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

rikku_(ffx-2).name: Rikku (FFX-2)
rikku_(ffx-2).notes:
Breaker with access to significant utility
Can provide on-demand AoE 75% breaks, or break by up to 80% with her cooldown or her LB.Can provide on-demand AoE mirage.Has cooldowns with AoE lightning imbue, AoE reraise, and AoE healing.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

paine.name: Paine
paine.notes:
Physical fire/ice/lightning/water chainer, but requires an external imperil
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

star_player_tidus.name: Star Player Tidus
star_player_tidus.notes:
Water physical chainer or finisher
 Can also use fire/wind, at a slight damage loss.Can AoE buff stats by 150%.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

yunalesca.name: Yunalesca
yunalesca.notes:
Wind/dark magic chainer
Has minor utility in the form of AoE heals, MP restoration, and ailment immunity.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

kimahri.name: Kimahri
kimahri.notes:
Support unit that can provide 2 stacks of AoE mirage
Can also provide stat buffs, healing, and breaks, but is typically bad enough at each of those that he cannot replace a dedicated unit.

lilisette.name: Lilisette
lilisette.notes:
Water/ice physical chainer
Can buff the party's physical mitigation by 30%.Also has a wide variety of other utility that is gated behind single-use abilities, single use unlocks, or cooldowns. This includes, but is not limited to, a 5k barrier, AoE debuff cure, 70% AoE full break, buff-only dispel, AoE healing, and AoE LB fill.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

wizardess_shantotto.name: Wizardess Shantotto
wizardess_shantotto.notes:
Water/dark/lightning magic chainer
 Can also opt for non-elemental chaining by spamming her LB, although that moderately decreases her damage output.Can buff the party's magic mitigation by 30% and provide an AoE 1k barrier.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

madam_edel.name: Madam Edel
madam_edel.notes:
Earth physical chainer
Her damage starts out very low then ramps up significantly over the course of 12 turns.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

xande.name: Xande
xande.notes:
Earth/dark magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

awakened_onion_knight.name: Awakened Onion Knight
awakened_onion_knight.notes:
Physical chainer with elemental flexibility
Has significant burst, immunity to the major ailments, and good innate elemental resists.Can buff the party's elemental resists.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

hein.name: Hein
hein.notes:
Fire/ice/lightning magic chainer
Can provide 50% general mitigation to the party as well as elemental resistance buffs.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

sieghard_&_ignacio.name: Sieghard & Ignacio
sieghard_&_ignacio.notes:
Physical cover tank with some support capabilities
Can buff mitigation by 40% and provide AoE LB fill.Alternately, he can be used as a physical finisher, but is generally worse at this role without an external imbue.

sakura_&_ayaka.name: Sakura & Ayaka
sakura_&_ayaka.notes:
Healer with some support capabilities
Can provide stat buffs, barriers, ailment immunity, break immunity, AoE reraise, LB fill, and more.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

sweet_nichol.name: Sweet Nichol
sweet_nichol.notes:
Ice/water magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

sweet_luka.name: Sweet Luka
sweet_luka.notes:
Buffer that can provide strong barriers
Relies on a random unlock to unlock her strongest skill, but the odds aren't all that bad.Can also provide imbues, imperils, stat buffs and unremarkable mitigation buffs.

paladin_cecil.name: Paladin Cecil
paladin_cecil.notes:
Magic cover and provoke tank with a full support kit
Can buff all stats by 180%, all elemental resists by 80%, and general mitigation by 50%.Provides massive passive AoE LB fill via counters.Can provide AoE HP/MP restoration, single target reraise, and emergency 65% breaks.Can dualcast his abilities (including cover and provoke).Has incredibly high survivability even by tank standards.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

palom_&_porom.name: Palom & Porom
palom_&_porom.notes:
Fire magic chainer
Can provide AoE mirage and 20% magic mitigation.Can provide significant healing, but this requires multiple turns of setup and will fall apart if they die, making them a poor substitute for an actual healer in most cases.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

white_mage_rosa.name: White Mage Rosa
white_mage_rosa.notes:
Healer with a fairly basic kit
Can provide AoE reraise.Can technically be used as a damage dealer, but is terrible at that role.

emperor_foo.name: Emperor Foo
emperor_foo.notes:
Time limited unitCombined buffer/breaker
Is somewhat subpar at each of those invidual roles, but being able to do both at once can be very valuable in many team compositions.Can provide breaks of up to 70%, stat buffs of up to 200%, 30% physical/magical general mitigation, AoE mirage, and significant LB fill.Also has some other buffs that cannot be maintained the entire time, such as 40% general mitigation and various elemental resists.

xuan_wu_&_qing_long.name: Xuan Wu & Qing Long
xuan_wu_&_qing_long.notes:
Time limited unitSPR-based physical fire/wind chainer
Has ludicrous survivability vs. magic damage, even beating out many actual magic tanks.Has access to AoE mirage.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

hess_king_lasswell.name: Hess King Lasswell
hess_king_lasswell.notes:
Physical fire/ice chainer
Can provide AoE reraise on a long cooldown.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

sacred_shield_charlotte.name: Sacred Shield Charlotte
sacred_shield_charlotte.notes:
Provoke and magic cover tank with significant support skills
Has innate dualcast, allowing her to both cover and provoke on turn 1.Can buff general mitigation by 50%, magic mitigation by 30%, fill LB gauges, buff light/ice resistance, buff DEF/SPR, and more.

warrior_of_dawn_galuf.name: Warrior of Dawn Galuf
warrior_of_dawn_galuf.notes:
Provoke and physical cover tank that can provide 50% general mitigation to the party
Can reach 100% passive provoke without the need for limited gear.Has 10% innate dodge (making it easier to gear for 100%) and can chain with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

awakened_warrior_of_light.name: Awakened Warrior of Light
awakened_warrior_of_light.notes:
Physical cover tank with significant support capabilities
Can reach 100% passive provoke without the need for limited gear.Has Curaja, elemental resistance buffs, physical mitigation, and AoE barriers.Can provide 50% general mitigation to the party, but the cooldown on this skill is longer than the duration, so he cannot maintain 100% uptime on this.

ignis.name: Ignis
ignis.notes:
Buffer with strong, flexible options at the expensive of slow, clunky setup time
Can provide 50% AoE mitigation, massive AoE LB fill, 80% elemental resistances, stat buffs, and more.

lucas.name: Lucas
lucas.notes:
Time limited unitMagic cover and provoke tank
Has significant utility, including AoE 50% general mitigation, magic mitigation of varying strengths, physical mitigation, mirage, imbues, and elemental resists.Relies on his LB to buff general mitigation, but may have trouble filling it quickly enough if he's only getting by elemental attacks that he fully resists, as he relies on his counters to fill his LB gauge efficiently.Chains with the Absolute Zero family.

lunafreya.name: Lunafreya
lunafreya.notes:
Buffer who specializes in magic mitigation
Can buff magic mitigation by up to 50%, general mitigation by 30%, stats by up to 200%, and four elemental resists by up to 100%.Can provide significant AoE LB fill and an AoE water imbue/imperil.

regis.name: Regis
regis.notes:
Buffer with an array of defensive options
Can buff general mitigation by up to 50%, physical and magical mitigation by 20%, provide barriers, buff stats by up to 200%, fill LB gauges, and grant break immunity to allies.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

warrior_of_light_lenna.name: Warrior of Light Lenna
warrior_of_light_lenna.notes:
Healer that can provide immunity to ailments, breaks, stop, and charm
Can buff mitigation by 30%.Has AoE reraise on her LB.Fills the LB gauge a bit while healing, and can massively fill ally LB gauged by emptying her own.

white_knight_noel.name: White Knight Noel
white_knight_noel.notes:
Time limited unitProvoke and magic cover tank
Can reach 100% passive provoke without the need for limited gear.Can AoE buff mitigation by 50%.Chains with the Tornado, Freeze, Absolute Zero, and Chaos Wave Awakened families.

a.i._katy.name: A.I. Katy
a.i._katy.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical/magical cover tank who can also provide 70% breaks
Typically must use her cover each turn to reapply the barrier, or she's at a higher risk of dying.Alternately, she can be built for damage and used as a chainer, although this is a much less potent option.

folka.name: Folka
folka.notes:
Healer with a varied support kit
Has Curaja and Reraise.Can buff every type of mitigation (albeit on separate cooldown abilities that lack 100% uptime), provide immunity to breaks/ailments/stop/charm, and restore MP to the party.

kryla.name: Kryla
kryla.notes:
Time limited unitBreaker with breaks of up to 75% for every stat, including a turn 1 70% full break
Can also imperil various elements, buff elemental resistances, fill ally LB gauges, and dispel + rebreak on the same turn.Chains with the Absolute Zero, Bolting Strike, and Chaos Wave families.

levinson.name: Levinson
levinson.notes:
Time limited unitIce/fire hybrid chainer
Can provide breaks and significant elemental resistance buffs starting on T2.Chains with the Bolting Strike and Aureole Ray families.

maritime_strategist_nichol.name: Maritime Strategist Nichol
maritime_strategist_nichol.notes:
Buffer with access to significant general mitigation buffs
Can buff all stats, regenerate HP/MP for the party, provide mitigation, buff elemental resistances, and cure breaks.Can also help to fill the LB and esper gauges.

myra.name: Myra
myra.notes:
Healer that can also provide buffs
Can bring stat buffs, partial ailment immunity, break immunity, and charm immunity.Has a version of Entrust that works with W-Ability.

sieghard.name: Sieghard
sieghard.notes:
Physical cover and provoke tank
He can cover magic, but isn't particularly great at doing so, as his magic cover ability has a cooldown and his stats are more aimed at surviving physical damage.His LB provides a 45% general mitigation buff to the party for three turns.

summer_fina_&_lid.name: Summer Fina & Lid
summer_fina_&_lid.notes:
Breaker with significant utility
In addition to providing breaks, has strong AoE healing, AoE reraise, AoE MP recovery, can grant a physical water Aureole Ray chaining move to allies and herself, can imbue allies with water (although this may also charm them), buff water resistance, imperil several elements, buff LB fill rate, and fill the LB gauge.

sylvie.name: Sylvie
sylvie.notes:
Breaker/buffer combination
At only 65%, her breaks are subpar compared to dedicated breakers, but she can provide stat buffs, typed mitigation, barriers, imbues, and more.

adventurer_locke.name: Adventurer Locke
adventurer_locke.notes:
Breaker with breaks of up to 84%
Can provide AoE mirage.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

aerith.name: Aerith
aerith.notes:
Healer with some utility
Can provide break immunity, AoE reraise, 30% general mitigation, and help to fill LBs.

doctor_aiden.name: Doctor Aiden
doctor_aiden.notes:
Healer with plenty of utility
Healing from his abilities is low, which can make it hard to actually make the most of said utility without external support, especially if the tank is taking lots of damage.

erik.name: Erik
erik.notes:
Time limited unitEarth physical chainer
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

neverending_hope.name: Neverending Hope
neverending_hope.notes:
Buffer who can grant a wide variety of elemental resistances, along with the more standard stat and general mitigation buffs
Can buff magic mitigation.Can provide significant ST LB fill.Also has some subpar breaks that could be useful in rare situations.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

olberic.name: Olberic
olberic.notes:
Physical cover and provoke tank
His LB provides a 40% general mitigation buff to the party for three turns.Chains with the Aureole Ray family.

sylvando.name: Sylvando
sylvando.notes:
Time limited unitBuffer with some unusual abilities
Can buff stats, elemental resistances, and physical mitigation.Can provide mirage, 2k AoE barriers, AoE LB fill, and some backup healing.

white_lily_dark_fina.name: White Lily Dark Fina
white_lily_dark_fina.notes:
Earth/dark/fire magic chainer
Can buff those same elemental resistances by 80%.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

yuraisha.name: Yuraisha
yuraisha.notes:
Can provide buffs to all stats, as well all three types of mitigation (although her general mitigation is on the low side)
Has AoE barriers, elemental resistance buffs, and AoE HP/MP regen.

agent_olive.name: Agent Olive
agent_olive.notes:
Dark/fire physical chainer
Can also serve as a finisher, but can only burst once per fight. Alternately, this skill can be used to burst as a chainer if you can provide her with external chains to cap.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

aldore_king_rain.name: Aldore King Rain
aldore_king_rain.notes:
Fire physical chainer
 Can also use lightning or earth at a minor damage loss.Can provide AoE barriers.Technically chains with the Stardust Ray family, but works very poorly with it in practice as most of his damage comes from his LB.

ardyn.name: Ardyn
ardyn.notes:
Dark/fire physical chainer
Can provide breaks that ramp up to 74%, although they're weak on turn 1 and will eat significantly into his damage if he tried to maintain them.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

auron.name: Auron
auron.notes:
Breaker who can also provide support chaining
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

aurora_fryevia.name: Aurora Fryevia
aurora_fryevia.notes:
Light hybrid chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity, Divine Ruination, and Aureole Ray families.

awakened_rain.name: Awakened Rain
awakened_rain.notes:
Magic cover and provoke tank
Can grant ailment/stop immunity to allies.Has AoE heals/MP restoration, at the cost of LB gauge.

dark_knight_leon.name: Dark Knight Leon
dark_knight_leon.notes:
Dark physical chainer
Bursts very hard.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

jasper_unbound.name: Jasper Unbound
jasper_unbound.notes:
Time limited unitLightning/dark physical chainer
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

kurasame.name: Kurasame
kurasame.notes:
Hybrid ice chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

lilith.name: Lilith
lilith.notes:
Time limited unitMagic cover tank with some utility
Can buff the party's general mitigation by 35% and magic mitigation by 30%.Can also cover physical, although her stats are not well-suited for it.Chains with the Divine Ruination, Bolting Strike, and Aureole Ray families.

lotus_mage_fina.name: Lotus Mage Fina
lotus_mage_fina.notes:
Healer with Curaja and Reraise
Can also apply AoE reraise.With her latent abilities, she can provide good buffs and elemental resistances via W-Ability, although the low healing on the turns that she refreshes these effects might be a problem.

machina.name: Machina
machina.notes:
Breaker and physical chainer
Damage drops significantly while maintaining breaks, so you typically have to choose which to focus on.Can buff physical and magical mitigation by 20%.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

mercenary_ramza.name: Mercenary Ramza
mercenary_ramza.notes:
Versatile tank
 Able to provoke and cover physical or magical damage.His magic cover has a cooldown, which may be a problem if you're planning to rely on reraise, or if the boss dispels him.Is immune to all ailments and charm, is 50% resistant to Stop, and has 30% innate resistance to all ailments.Has Entrust.

operative_zyrus.name: Operative Zyrus
operative_zyrus.notes:
Ice/lightning/dark magic chainer
Can burst hard once per battle via his Magnus skill.Chains with the Absolute Zero, Bolting Strike, and Chaos Wave Awakened families.

physalis.name: Physalis
physalis.notes:
Ice physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

rab.name: Rab
rab.notes:
Time limited unitWind/lightning/dark hybrid chainer
Can provide significant backup healing.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

radiant_lightning.name: Radiant Lightning
radiant_lightning.notes:
Lightning physical chainer
Can serve as a breaker in a pinch, although her damage would suffer greatly and she would struggle with bosses that get dispelled.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

seaside_nichol.name: Seaside Nichol
seaside_nichol.notes:
Support unit focusing exclusively on defensive buffs
Can provide significant DEF/SPR buffs, all three types of mitigation, and some minor barriers.Unfortunately, his physical/magical mitigation buffs cannot be dualcast, which means he cannot provide much in the way of HP/MP restoration while maintaining those.Can cure imperils and berserk (as well as breaks, charm, and stop).

serena.name: Serena
serena.notes:
Time limited unitHealer with good utility
Can buff magic mitigation by 30%, provide AoE reraise, grant ST ailment/charm/stop/break immunity (with AoE on a cooldown), restore MP, and briefly buff general mitigation by 40%.

warrior_of_light_bartz.name: Warrior of Light Bartz
warrior_of_light_bartz.notes:
Wind physical chainer
Requires several turns of setup time before dealing any damage.Has Entrust, and his LB automatically fills at the beginning of each stage, allowing him to instantly fill any other unit's LB at the start of a fight if desired.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

assassin_shadow.name: Assassin Shadow
assassin_shadow.notes:
Can be used as a dodge provoke tank that also provides mirage every turn
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

basch.name: Basch
basch.notes:
Physical and magical cover tank
Has some support capabilities in the form of breaks and buffs.

beowulf.name: Beowulf
beowulf.notes:
Fairly standard breaker
Will struggle with fights that require AoE breaks.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

beryl.name: Beryl
beryl.notes:
Magic tank with some support capabilities
Can provide breaks, but because you typically need both breaks and cover on turn 1, he may not be able to replace a dedicated breaker in many team compositions.Chains with the Bolting Strike, Chaos Wave, Octaslash, and Disorder families.

chow.name: Chow
chow.notes:
Time limited unitUnusual combination of healer and magic cover tank
Can provide stat buffs and 30% general mitigation.His LB provides 1 turn of 54% general mitigation and also refills the team's MP.His rotation can be somewhat awkward to work with, and he lacks much of the standard healer utility, so replacing your healer with him has drawbacks.

demon_rain.name: Demon Rain
demon_rain.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical cover and provoke tank
Has high survivability, but not much utility.

elena.name: Elena
elena.notes:
Hybrid chainer with elemental flexibility and buffing capabilities
Can provide stat buffs, barriers, and mitigation to the party.Chains with the Stardust Ray and Bolting Strike families.

eleven.name: Eleven
eleven.notes:
Time limited unitFire/lightning physical chainer
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

godrea.name: Godrea
godrea.notes:
Water/dark/ice physical chainer
Requires several turns of setup to deal optimal damage.Can restore the party's HP and MP by using items in an AoE.Chains primarily with the Divine Ruination, but can also chain with the Bolting Strike, Absolute Mirror of Equity, Absolute Zero, and Chaos Wave families at a moderate damage loss.

heavenly_technician_lid.name: Heavenly Technician Lid
heavenly_technician_lid.notes: Her T1 AoE breaks aren't quite as strong as those of some other units, but she can later on upgrade them to 79% once her LB is ready

hyoh.name: Hyoh
hyoh.notes:
Fire/lightning physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Absolute Mirror of Equity families.

karten.name: Karten
karten.notes:
Dark physical chainer with high burst
Chains with the Bolting Strike family, aside from his burst, which chains with the Aureole Ray family (singlecast only).

loren.name: Loren
loren.notes:
Competent breaker that can also chain
Chains with the Onion Slice and Aureole Ray families.

lucius.name: Lucius
lucius.notes:
Time limited unitDark/fire physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

mastermind_xon.name: Mastermind Xon
mastermind_xon.notes:
Physical chainer with significant utility
Can maintain 70% breaks on a single enemy by alternating his cooldown breaks with another Mastermind Xon.Can provide AoE mirage.Can copy buffs from allies or enemies, then share them with the party.Chains with the Bolting Strike, Stardust Ray, Absolute Zero, Absolute Mirror of Equity, and Aureole Ray families.

riku.name: Riku
riku.notes:
Time limited unitDark physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

rivera.name: Rivera
rivera.notes:
Unusual support unit able to turn any ally into a provoke tank or AoE physical cover tank, although whoever she picks will be significantly less durable than a normal tank
Can provide AoE Mirage, restore MP, and heal.

sephiroth_(kh).name: Sephiroth (KH)
sephiroth_(kh).notes:
Time limited unitDark/light physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

shadow_lord.name: Shadow Lord
shadow_lord.notes:
Dark physical chainer
Has ludicrous survivability thanks to his upgraded Immortal Justice passive.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

the_lord_of_shadows.name: The Lord of Shadows
the_lord_of_shadows.notes:
Time limited unitDark physical chainer
Has an 80% ATK/MAG break, but it renders the boss immune to damage for two turns, making it more of an emergency tool than anything else.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

yuna.name: Yuna
yuna.notes:
Healer with some support capabilities
Has some utility in the form of various elemental resistance buffs, esper gauge fill, and a DEF/SPR buff.

zargabaath.name: Zargabaath
zargabaath.notes:
Buffer with significant general mitigation buffs
Can temporarily provide break immunity.Can reraise allies and provide massive HP/MP restoration to single targets.Can chain with the Octaslash family.

zeno_of_the_beta_star.name: Zeno of the Beta Star
zeno_of_the_beta_star.notes:
Fire physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

2b.name: 2B
2b.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical chainer that also provides breaks
Only works well in that combined role when paired with a copy of herself, as the lion's share of her damage comes from her LB.

aloha_lasswell.name: Aloha Lasswell
aloha_lasswell.notes:
Water/wind physical chainer with high innate evasion
Reaches 80% dodge with just two copies of his own TM, making it very easy to gear him for 100%.Has a provoke skill.He has a physical AoE cover ability with a cooldown. If you pair him with another copy, you can alternate the cooldowns and maintain 100% uptime.Burns through MP very, very quickly.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

ayaka.name: Ayaka
ayaka.notes:
Fairly standard healer
Can slightly fill ally LB gauges and provide barriers.

chocobo_fina.name: Chocobo Fina
chocobo_fina.notes:
Physical chainer who scales off of SPR
Requires an external imperil.Her high SPR makes her very durable against magic damage.Has some healer-ish utility, such as reraise.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

christine.name: Christine
christine.notes:
Time limited unitIce magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

cid.name: Cid
cid.notes:
Physical finisher
Requires several turns of setup, and relies heavily on external imperils in order to deal good damage, but can burst very hard in the right circumstances.

circe.name: Circe
circe.notes:
Magic chainer with plenty of elemental flexibility
Chains with the Absolute Zero, Chaos Wave, and Bolting Strike families.

fryevia.name: Fryevia
fryevia.notes:
Ice hybrid chainer
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

holy_night_amelia_&_emilia.name: Holy Night Amelia & Emilia
holy_night_amelia_&_emilia.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical chainer with subpar breaks
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

jade.name: Jade
jade.notes:
Time limited unitFire/ice/lightning physical chainer
Requires an external imperil.Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

kimono_fina.name: Kimono Fina
kimono_fina.notes:
Ice/light magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.Can provide some minor support capabilities, most notably LB fill via her own LB.

king_edgar_of_figaro.name: King Edgar of Figaro
king_edgar_of_figaro.notes:
Will struggle with fights that demand AoE breaks on the first turn
Can imperil several elements and chain with the Stardust Ray family.

magitek_warrior_terra.name: Magitek Warrior Terra
magitek_warrior_terra.notes:
Fire/wind/light magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

monk_sabin_of_kolts.name: Monk Sabin of Kolts
monk_sabin_of_kolts.notes:
Fire/water physical chainer
Requires external imperils.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

mordegon.name: Mordegon
mordegon.notes:
Time limited unitIce/dark magic chainer
Requires extensive ramp up time to reach peak damage, and suffers greatly if he dies.Can provide breaks, but must be paired with another copy of himself so that they can stagger their break cooldowns to maintain 100%. And this won't work well against bosses that must be dispelled frequently.Chains with the Absolute Zero family.

primrose.name: Primrose
primrose.notes:
Buffer with a fairly standard kit
Can buff mitigation by up to 40% (but drops down to 30% on some turns due to cooldowns), provides stat buffs, imbues allies with dark, and can fill the LB gauge.Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

pyro_glacial_lasswell.name: Pyro Glacial Lasswell
pyro_glacial_lasswell.notes:
Fire/ice physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.His damage relies heavily on unlocking his latent abilities.

rena.name: Rena
rena.notes:
Time limited unitCombined healer and buffer
Can provide 35% magic mitigation (50% on a cooldown), AoE reraise, break/ailment/stop/charm immunity, 30% general mitigation, an undispellable 200% DEF/SPR buff, and an AoE light imbue/120% imperil.

sora.name: Sora
sora.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical chainer
Has no imperils of his own.Chains with the Divine Ruination and Absolute Mirror of Equity families.

tsukiko.name: Tsukiko
tsukiko.notes:
Magic chainer with several elements to choose from
Can provide 75% breaks, although 100% uptime requires a dupe to stagger cooldowns with and a somewhat wonky rotation.Can effortlessly maintain 65% breaks as part of her normal damage rotation.Chains with the Chaos Wave, Absolute Zero, and Bolting Strike families.

veronica.name: Veronica
veronica.notes:
Time limited unitNonelemental magic chainer
Requires extensive ramp up time to reach peak damage, and suffers greatly if she dies.Chains with the Absolute Zero family.

warrior_of_light_krile.name: Warrior of Light Krile
warrior_of_light_krile.notes:
Light/wind magic chainer
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

wild_rose_firion.name: Wild Rose Firion
wild_rose_firion.notes:
Physical chainer with some elemental flexibility
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

akstar.name: Akstar
akstar.notes:
Fire/ice physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

archmage_kefka.name: Archmage Kefka
archmage_kefka.notes:
Ice/lightning/dark magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

bart.name: Bart
bart.notes:
Time limited unitBizarre mix of dodge-based provoke tank and support
Can provide 60% AoE breaks, AoE mirage, AoE LB fill rate, single target imbues, single target LB fill, and some minor AoE MP sustain.Chains with the Kingsglaive, Tornado, and Flood families.

cloud_(kh).name: Cloud (KH)
cloud_(kh).notes:
Time limited unitPhysical chainer
Has no imperils of his own.Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

crown_prince_noctis.name: Crown Prince Noctis
crown_prince_noctis.notes:
Physical finisher
Requires an external imperil.

dark_mage_exdeath.name: Dark Mage Exdeath
dark_mage_exdeath.notes:
Wind/earth/dark magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

dressy_aileen.name: Dressy Aileen
dressy_aileen.notes:
Earth physical chainer with some utility
Can also use light, although she has no imperil for that element.Can fill ally LB gauges.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

eiko.name: Eiko
eiko.notes:
Healer who can fill the evoke gauge
Can cure all debuffs, including berserk, charm, stop, imperils, and breaks.

flammie.name: Flammie
flammie.notes:
Time limited unitSubpar buffer
As a buffer, he has some uncommon and useful utility, but is also missing some standard buffer abilities, such as 100% uptime on general mitigation and AoE MP regen, which may force you to rely on other units to cover the gaps in his kit.Can chain with the Aureole Ray family.

gentiana.name: Gentiana
gentiana.notes:
Ice magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

gladiolus.name: Gladiolus
gladiolus.notes:
Physical cover tank
His other skills are, unfortunately, mostly irrelevant.

lovely_katy.name: Lovely Katy
lovely_katy.notes:
Time limited unitHealer that can also provide AoE reraise
Has a fairly bare-bones kit by healer standards.

malphasie.name: Malphasie
malphasie.notes:
Wind/dark hybrid chainer
Can chain with the Bolting Strike, Aureole Ray, and Tornado families.With her cooldown skill, she can AoE fill the LB gauge and break enemy DEF/SPR by 74%.

prompto.name: Prompto
prompto.notes:
Breaker with chaining capabilities
Chains with the Octaslash family.Has a 65% AoE ATK/MAG break and a 70% DEF break.

raegen.name: Raegen
raegen.notes:
Fire and ice physical chainer
Imbues himself with both elements as part of his rotation, so his damage suffers noticeably if the enemy is immune to either one.Can buff most elemental resistances.Chains with the Divine Ruination and Absolute Mirror of Equity families.

reberta.name: Reberta
reberta.notes:
Fire/ice/lightning physical chainer
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

red_xiii.name: Red XIII
red_xiii.notes:
Physical chainer with elemental flexibility
Can provide AoE mirage.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

rem.name: Rem
rem.notes:
Unusual combination of healer and chainer
Can dualcast Curaja and Tornado, allowing her to serve as a support chainer.Unlike most 7* healers, does not have the ability to heal and reraise on the same turn.

sol.name: Sol
sol.notes:
Light/dark magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

yuffie.name: Yuffie
yuffie.notes:
Physical chainer with elemental flexibility
Can provide AoE mirage.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

blossom_sage_sakura.name: Blossom Sage Sakura
blossom_sage_sakura.notes:
Lightning magic chainer
Has some decent support capabilities, including AoE mitigation and ailment immunity buffs.

elephim.name: Elephim
elephim.notes:
Support unit with both breaks and buffs
Provides 75% breaks and 200% buffs.Can also provide some significant AoE healing and an AoE light imbue.

ellesperis.name: Ellesperis
ellesperis.notes:
Dark physical chainer
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

esther.name: Esther
esther.notes:
Lightning physical chainer
Chains with the Bolting Strike, and Aureole Ray (singlecast only) families.

grim_lord_sakura.name: Grim Lord Sakura
grim_lord_sakura.notes:
Time limited unitFire/dark magic chainer with support capabilities
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.Can buff DEF/SPR, provide 35% AoE mitigation, reraise allies, grant break/partial ailment immunity, apply barriers, restore MP, and slightly fill the LB gauge.

kimono_ayaka.name: Kimono Ayaka
kimono_ayaka.notes:
Physical chainer whose damage scales off of SPR
Requires an external imperil.Can provide some AoE healing/MP regen.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

nalu.name: Nalu
nalu.notes:
Physical lightning chainer
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

roy.name: Roy
roy.notes:
Support unit with strong buffs and breaks on T1
 However, as soon as they expire, he becomes significantly worse because he can't refresh them with the same potency.Works best when paired with another breaker who cannot break well on T1.

beatrix.name: Beatrix
beatrix.notes:
Physical light chainer
Can provide adequate breaks after turn 1, albeit at a massive damage loss.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

citan.name: Citan
citan.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical water/wind chainer
Requires an external imperil.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

ignacio.name: Ignacio
ignacio.notes:
Fire physical finisher who can also imbue other units with fire
Has some minor buffing capabilities, but the stat buffs cost LB crystals, meaning that they are typically unusable on the first turn.

immortal_knight_garland.name: Immortal Knight Garland
immortal_knight_garland.notes:
Dark physical chainer
Can buff several elemental resists by 70%. Also has a 70% AoE full break, albeit on a very long cooldown.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

mediena.name: Mediena
mediena.notes:
Magic ice chainer
Can buff the party's stats and restore MP.Chains with the Absolute Zero and Freeze families.

nameless_gunner_jake.name: Nameless Gunner Jake
nameless_gunner_jake.notes:
Physical finisher with elemental flexibility
Requires several turns of setup.

randi.name: Randi
randi.notes:
Time limited unitDecent physical chainer with some elemental flexibility
Chains with the Aureole Ray (singlecast only), Absolute Mirror of Equity, Bolting Strike, and Absolute Zero families.Pairs decently with Esther due to being able to match her rotation, although his damage is far, far lower than hers.

regina.name: Regina
regina.notes:
Physical finisher
Suffers from very, very low survivability, and keeping her alive will be a struggle on many fights.

viktor_marchenko.name: Viktor Marchenko
viktor_marchenko.notes:
Time limited unitProvoke tank with subpar survivability
Chains with the Aureole Ray family.Can become immune to charm, stop, breaks, and ailments.Can heal himself and restore his own MP.

zack.name: Zack
zack.notes:
Physical finisher
Relies on an external imbue to maximize his damage output.

jecht.name: Jecht
jecht.notes:
Physical water chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

kaito.name: Kaito
kaito.notes:
Physical solo damage dealer
Very unusual in that his damage comes almost entirely from damage over time effects, meaning that he doesn't work as a finisher (and his damage as a chainer is not worth mentioning).Can provide AoE mirage.Will struggle (and typically fail) at trials that impose time limits.

knight_delita.name: Knight Delita
knight_delita.notes: Physical chainer or finisher with a 74% ATK/MAG/DEF break attached to his LB

maria_(xenogears).name: Maria (Xenogears)
maria_(xenogears).notes:
Time limited unitMagic chainer that can choose between fire and non-elemental damage
Has significant ramp-up time with non-elemental damage.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family (with her fire move only).

ramza.name: Ramza
ramza.notes:
Mediocre support unit with breaks and buffs, although he has trouble providing both at once in a clean rotation
Can dualcast 60% breaks for all four stats.Can sing for buffs/regen, but you will have gaps in the song buff uptime if you try to have him also maintain breaks.Consider giving Cradle of Horns to him or another party member to cover those gaps.

squall.name: Squall
squall.notes:
Physical chainer with elemental flexibility
Can also function as a finisher, although his hits are spread out and may not fit well into many chains.Technically chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family, but his chaining moves are very weak and the bulk of his damage comes from capping his own chains with Keen Edge, which would break the chain when done with anyone but another Squall.

summer_folka_&_citra.name: Summer Folka & Citra
summer_folka_&_citra.notes:
Water/light evoke chainer with significant utility
Can grant ailment/break/charm/stop resistance to allies, buff water/light resistance, buff stats, AoE recover LB, buff LB fillrate, provide healing and mitigation (on a cooldown), and imbue allies with light (which may charm them).Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family, and can grant a physical water Aureole Ray attack to themselves or allies.

yego.name: Yego
yego.notes:
Earth physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

ace.name: Ace
ace.notes:
Subpar buffer
Unfortunately, his buffs are semi-random.

atoning_dragoon_kain.name: Atoning Dragoon Kain
atoning_dragoon_kain.notes:
Physical chainer with elemental flexibility
 Can also serve as a finisher (which requires several turns of setup).Chains with the Graviton Cannon family.

emperor.name: Emperor
emperor.notes:
Fire magic finisher
Requires some ramp up time to hit peak damage.

fei.name: Fei
fei.notes:
Time limited unitDark physical chainer
Can also chain with wind, which is noticeably weaker, or with several other elements, which are drastically weaker but could be useful in certain situations.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family (only with his dark move).

high_seraph_ultima.name: High Seraph Ultima
high_seraph_ultima.notes:
Non-elemental magic chainer with solid utility
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.Can simultaneously dispel enemy buffs and ally debuffs, while leaving enemy debuffs and ally buffs intact.Burns through MP extremely quickly.

karlette.name: Karlette
karlette.notes:
Hybrid chainer with elemental flexiblity and support capabilities
Can buff elemental resistances and mitigation.Can AoE break ATK/MAG by 70%, but this ability is on a cooldown.Chains with the Quick Hit, Absolute Mirror of Equity, and Aureole Ray families.

lila.name: Lila
lila.notes:
Terrible physical chainer
She also has SPR-scaling moves, but they are much weaker.She can switch between fire and lightning damage.Chains with the Graviton Cannon and Stardust Ray families.

livid_shantotto.name: Livid Shantotto
livid_shantotto.notes:
Primarily fire/water magic chainer
Can also use other elements.Has horrifically low health, which impedes her usability on harder trials.Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

qin.name: Qin
qin.notes:
Time limited unitCombined buffer/breaker
Is somewhat subpar at each of those invidual roles, but being able to do both at once can be very valuable in many team compositions.Can provide breaks of up to 65%, stat buffs of up to 200%, 40% general mitigation (50% on a cooldown), and 70% to all elmenetal resists.

seabreeze_dark_fina.name: Seabreeze Dark Fina
seabreeze_dark_fina.notes:
Magic chainer
She is locked into using two elements at once, has ramp up time, and will suffer greatly if she dies or if the boss gets dispelled.Her damage is absolutely terrible unless you unlock her latent abilities.

balthier.name: Balthier
balthier.notes:
Physical finisher with elemental flexibility
His damage output is heavily affected by randomness, and may break some chains.

black_mage_golbez.name: Black Mage Golbez
black_mage_golbez.notes:
Terrible dark/light magic chainer
Burns through MP very quickly.Has a lot of built-in elemental resistances.Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

dark_fina.name: Dark Fina
dark_fina.notes:
Magic chainer
She is locked into using three elements at once, has ramp up time, and will suffer greatly if she dies or if the boss gets dispelled.Her damage is absolutely terrible unless you unlock her latent abilities.

elly.name: Elly
elly.notes:
Time limited unitFire/water/wind/earth magic chainer
Can also be used as a finisher via her LB, which is a physical attack and can therefore be affected by imbues or elemental weapons.Chains with the Chaos Wave Awakened family.

fayt.name: Fayt
fayt.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical chainer with elemental flexibility
Requires quite a few turns of ramp-up to reach his maximum damage potential.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

marie.name: Marie
marie.notes:
Terrible support unit that focuses on buffing elemental resistances
Can also provide AoE mitigation or barriers via cooldown.

morgana.name: Morgana
morgana.notes:
Magic ice chainer
Chains with the Absolute Zero family.

nagi.name: Nagi
nagi.notes:
Light/dark hybrid chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

rinoa.name: Rinoa
rinoa.notes:
Non-elemental magic finisher
Can slightly fill ally LB gauges with Aura.

sephiroth.name: Sephiroth
sephiroth.notes:
Light and dark physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.His damage requires several turns to ramp up.

sophia.name: Sophia
sophia.notes:
Time limited unitMagical chainer with elemental flexibility
Chains with the Chaos Wave and Quake families.

a2.name: A2
a2.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical chainer who relies on external imperils
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

crimson.name: Crimson
crimson.notes:
Fire physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

tiana.name: Tiana
tiana.notes:
Time limited unitEarth magic chainer
Can help to sustain the party's HP/MP via her limit burst.

tifa.name: Tifa
tifa.notes:
Water physical chainer
Requires several turns of ramp up.Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

yun.name: Yun
yun.notes:
Time limited unitFire physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity and Bolting Strike families.

ang.name: Ang
ang.notes:
Time limited unitFire physical finisher
While his maximum burst can only be done once every five turns, he can use smaller bursts in between.

aranea.name: Aranea
aranea.notes:
Physical finisher
Has no utility and requires several turns of setup for one turn of burst damage.

bai_hu_&_zhu_que.name: Bai Hu & Zhu Que
bai_hu_&_zhu_que.notes:
Time limited unitFire/lightning physical chainer with fairly high survivability vs
 incoming magic damage.Chains with the Divine Ruination family.Has an alternate SPR-heavy build, but this option deals much less damage.

cloud.name: Cloud
cloud.notes:
Physical finisher
Can also chain with the Meteor Rain family, but the damage is pretty bad.

dracu_lasswell.name: Dracu Lasswell
dracu_lasswell.notes:
Time limited unitTerrible ice physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Absolute Mirror of Equity families.

duke.name: Duke
duke.notes:
Ice physical finisher
Requires several turns of setup.

emperor_shera.name: Emperor Shera
emperor_shera.notes:
Very weak fire physical chainer
Can imbue himself and another unit with fire, but this lacks 100% uptime and his terrible damage makes him a poor chaining partner.Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

felix.name: Felix
felix.notes:
Time limited unitTerrible fire/earth hybrid chainer
Has no real chaining partners-- technically, several of his moves do belong to the Aureole Ray and Octaslash families, but those moves are very weak and he wants to cap his chains with the much stronger Salute - Blade Rush, something that only another Felix can do.Requires several turns to really get going.

citra.name: Citra
citra.notes:
Terrible magical light chainer with some minor support capabilities
She can chain with the Divine Ruination family.Can buff the party's magic mitigation by 35%, refill MP, fill the esper gauge, and heal the party a bit.

kunshira.name: Kunshira
kunshira.notes:
Hybrid chainer with great elemental flexibility
Can buff various elemental resistances, while also buffing DEF/SPR at the same time. With two of her, you can maintain this buff 100% of the time.Chains with the Aureole Ray family.

noctis.name: Noctis
noctis.notes:
Bizarre physical chainer who requires setup and has several turns of downtime
Damage output is high while Armiger Wakes, then plummets to almost nothing for several turns while waiting for the unlock to cool down again.

nyx.name: Nyx
nyx.notes:
Physical fire chainer with terrible damage and utility
Can AoE fill the team's LB by sacrificing his life.Chains with the Kingsglaive family.

olive.name: Olive
olive.notes:
Lightning finisher
Her primary finishing moves have significant casting times, meaning that most chains will be unable to fit both hits when she dualcasts them.

queen.name: Queen
queen.notes:
Lightning physical chainer
Has very high survivability thanks to the 200% DEF/SPR buffs from Berserk+2.Provides MP regen for the party.Chains with the Quick Hit family.

aileen.name: Aileen
aileen.notes:
Terrible earth physical chainer
Can provide AoE LB fill.Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

dark_knight_luneth.name: Dark Knight Luneth
dark_knight_luneth.notes:
Dark physical finisher with extreme suicidal tendencies
His high HP costs coupled with triple cast means that it is nearly impossible to keep alive.

lenneth.name: Lenneth
lenneth.notes:
Time limited unitDark physical chainer
Very difficult to chain due to her walking frames.

marquis_de_léon.name: Marquis de Léon
marquis_de_léon.notes:
Time limited unitTerrible provoke tank with a few very weak chaining skills
Has a 60% break on a 5 turn cooldown, which can allow him to weaken nasty threshold attacks, but he cannot serve as a primary breaker.

onion_knight_refia.name: Onion Knight Refia
onion_knight_refia.notes:
Physical damage dealer with elemental flexibility
Chains with the Onion Slice family, but not very well, due to requiring unlocks.

barbariccia.name: Barbariccia
barbariccia.notes:
Terrible magical wind chainer
Can cap her chains with Raging Wind for massive damage after several turns of ramp-up, or instead cap with Aeroja for AoE damage.Chains with the Tornado family.

dark_knight_cecil.name: Dark Knight Cecil
dark_knight_cecil.notes:
Terrible dark physical finisher
Has lots of human killer passives, but even with those, his damage is not competitive.

dragonlord.name: Dragonlord
dragonlord.notes: Time limited unitTerrible fire magical finisher

fohlen.name: Fohlen
fohlen.notes:
Terrible physical finisher
His burst is decent but requires several turns of setup.

jiraiya.name: Jiraiya
jiraiya.notes:
Subpar hybrid chainer with some elemental flexibility
Requires setup before he can use any of his best moves, and even then his damage isn't amazing.After setup, he can chain with the Divine Ruination, Kingsglaive, and Octaslash families.Can provide decent AoE elemental resists with attached mirage.

onion_knight.name: Onion Knight
onion_knight.notes:
Terrible physical damage dealer with elemental flexibility
Can break enemy DEF by 74%, and buff several elemental resistances by 70%.Chains with the Onion Slice family.

orlandeau.name: Orlandeau
orlandeau.notes:
Light physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

pure_summoner_rydia.name: Pure Summoner Rydia
pure_summoner_rydia.notes:
Weak summoner
Requires setup before bursting for very low amounts of damage.Has niche applications against bosses with high mitigation, as evoke damage will ignore said mitigation.

trance_terra.name: Trance Terra
trance_terra.notes:
Fire/dark magic chainer
Requires an external imperil.Very high MP consumption.Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

veritas_of_the_dark.name: Veritas of the Dark
veritas_of_the_dark.notes:
Dark physical chainer
Has a bit of utility in the form of AoE mitigation, a 74% ATK break on his LB, and AoE dark resistance.Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

adam_jensen.name: Adam Jensen
adam_jensen.notes:
Time limited unitFire physical chainer with access to 2-stack AoE mirage
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

estark.name: Estark
estark.notes:
Time limited unitTerrible dark physical chainer
Can chain with the Divine Ruination family.

immortal_flame_katy.name: Immortal Flame Katy
immortal_flame_katy.notes:
Time limited unitTerrible magical chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave, Quake, Tornado, Flood, and Freeze families, although her damage is by far the best with Chaos Wave.

lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.notes:
Terrible lightning physical chainer
Chains with the Quick Hit family.Buffs her own stats by 150%, which can allow you to forego a buffer.

lunera.name: Lunera
lunera.notes:
Terrible magic chainer with some buffing capabilities
Chains with the Aureole Ray family.

prishe.name: Prishe
prishe.notes:
Terrible physical chainer
Locked behind setup turns and has no chaining partners.Can provide AoE reraise.

tidus.name: Tidus
tidus.notes:
Impossibly bad water physical chainer
Technically chains with the Quick Hit family, but his rotation is a mess. Constant switching between single cast, dual cast, and triple cast means he has no real partners.

veritas_of_the_light.name: Veritas of the Light
veritas_of_the_light.notes:
Light hybrid AoE chainer or finisher
Can cure all debuffs from a single ally, including berserk, charm, stop, imperils, and breaks.

vincent.name: Vincent
vincent.notes:
Subpar physical chainer with no partners
Has a single target 55% full break.

gilgamesh.name: Gilgamesh
gilgamesh.notes:
Terrible physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

popstar_katy.name: Popstar Katy
popstar_katy.notes:
Time limited unitAbsolutely terrible magical chainer/finisher
Far worse than most 6* units.Do not use.
